00019 BOOLEAN ConvertToETRLE( UINT8 ** ppDest, UINT32 * puiDestLen, UINT8 ** ppSubImageBuffer, UINT16 * pusNumberOfSubImages, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, UINT32 fFlags );
00020 
00021 #define CONVERT_ADD_APPDATA                                                         0x0001
00022 #define CONVERT_ADD_JA2DATA                                                         0x0003
00023 #define CONVERT_ZLIB_COMPRESS                                                 0x0010
00024 #define CONVERT_ETRLE_COMPRESS                                                0x0020
00025 #define CONVERT_ETRLE_COMPRESS_SINGLE                             0x0040
00026 #define CONVERT_ETRLE_NO_SUBIMAGE_SHRINKING           0x0080
00027 #define CONVERT_ETRLE_DONT_SKIP_BLANKS                      0x0100
00028 #define CONVERT_ETRLE_FLIC                                                          0x0200
00029 #define CONVERT_ETRLE_FLIC_TRIM                                               0x0400
00030 #define CONVERT_ETRLE_FLIC_NAME                                               0x0800
00031 #define CONVERT_TO_8_BIT                                                                  0x1000
00032 #define CONVERT_TO_16_BIT                                                                 0x2000
00033 // NB 18-bit is actually 24 bit but with only 6 bits used in each byte.  I implemented
00034 // it to see how well such images would compress with ZLIB.
00035 #define CONVERT_TO_18_BIT                                                                 0x4000
00036 
00037 // Defines for inserting red/green/blue values into a 16-bit pixel.  
00038 // MASK is the mask to use to get the proper bits out of a byte (part of a 24-bit pixel)
00039 // use SHIFT_RIGHT to move the masked bits to the lowest bits of the byte
00040 // use SHIFT_LEFT to put the bits in their proper place in the 16-bit pixel
00041 #define RED_DEPTH_16                            5
00042 #define GREEN_DEPTH_16                    6
00043 #define BLUE_DEPTH_16                           5
00044 #define RED_MASK_16                                   0xF8
00045 #define RED_SHIFT_RIGHT_16          3
00046 #define RED_SHIFT_LEFT_16                 11
00047 #define GREEN_MASK_16                           0xFC
00048 #define GREEN_SHIFT_RIGHT_16  2
00049 #define GREEN_SHIFT_LEFT_16         5
00050 #define BLUE_MASK_16                            0xF8
00051 #define BLUE_SHIFT_RIGHT_16         3
00052 #define BLUE_SHIFT_LEFT_16          0
00053 
00054 #define RED_DEPTH_24                            8
00055 #define GREEN_DEPTH_24                    8
00056 #define BLUE_DEPTH_24                           8
00057 #define RED_MASK_24                                   0x00FF0000
00058 #define GREEN_MASK_24                           0x0000FF00
00059 #define BLUE_MASK_24                            0x000000FF
00060 
00061 //#define JA2_OBJECT_DATA_SIZE      16
00062 
00063 // this funky union is used for fast 16-bit pixel format conversions
00064 typedef union
00065 {
00066       struct
00067       {
00068             UINT16      usLower;
00069             UINT16      usHigher;
00070       };
00071       UINT32      uiValue;
00072 } SplitUINT32;
00073

00075 
00076 void ConvertRGBDistribution555To565( UINT16 * p16BPPData, UINT32 uiNumberOfPixels )
00077 {
00078       UINT16 *    pPixel;
00079       UINT32            uiLoop;
00080       
00081       SplitUINT32       Pixel;
00082 
00083       pPixel = p16BPPData;
00084       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < uiNumberOfPixels; uiLoop++)
00085       {
00086             // we put the 16 pixel bits in the UPPER word of uiPixel, so that we can
00087             // right shift the blue value (at the bottom) into the LOWER word to keep it
00088             // out of the way
00089             Pixel.usHigher = *pPixel;
00090             Pixel.uiValue >>= 5;
00091             // add a least significant bit to green
00092             Pixel.usHigher <<= 1;
00093             // now shift back into the upper word
00094             Pixel.uiValue <<= 5;
00095             // and copy back
00096             *pPixel = Pixel.usHigher;
00097             pPixel++;
00098       }
00099 }

00101 void WriteSTIFile( INT8 *pData, SGPPaletteEntry *pPalette, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight,  STR cOutputName, UINT32 fFlags, UINT32 uiAppDataSize )
00102 {
00103 
00104       FILE *                                          pOutput;
00105 
00106       UINT32                                          uiOriginalSize;
00107       UINT8 *                                         pOutputBuffer = NULL;
00108       UINT32                                          uiCompressedSize;
00109 
00110       STCIHeader                          Header;
00111       UINT32                                          uiLoop;
00112       image_type                          Image;
00113 
00114       SGPPaletteEntry *       pSGPPaletteEntry;
00115       STCIPaletteElement      STCIPaletteEntry;
00116 
00117       STCISubImage *                pSubImageBuffer;
00118       UINT16                                          usNumberOfSubImages;
00119       UINT32                                          uiSubImageBufferSize=0;
00120 
00121       //UINT16                                        usLoop;
00122       
00123       memset( &Header, 0, STCI_HEADER_SIZE );
00124       memset( &Image, 0, sizeof( image_type ));
00125       
00126 
00127       uiOriginalSize = sWidth * sHeight * (8 / 8);
00128 
00129       // set up STCI header for output
00130       memcpy( Header.cID, STCI_ID_STRING, STCI_ID_LEN );
00131       Header.uiTransparentValue = 0;
00132       Header.usHeight = sHeight;
00133       Header.usWidth = sWidth;
00134       Header.ubDepth = 8;
00135       Header.uiOriginalSize = uiOriginalSize;
00136       Header.uiStoredSize = uiOriginalSize;
00137       Header.uiAppDataSize = uiAppDataSize;
00138 
00139       Header.fFlags |= STCI_INDEXED;
00140       if (Header.ubDepth == 8)
00141       {
00142             // assume 8-bit pixels indexing into 256 colour palette with 24 bit values in
00143             // the palette
00144             Header.Indexed.uiNumberOfColours = 256;
00145             Header.Indexed.ubRedDepth = 8;
00146             Header.Indexed.ubGreenDepth = 8;
00147             Header.Indexed.ubBlueDepth = 8;
00148       }
00149 
00150       if ((Header.fFlags & STCI_INDEXED) && (fFlags & CONVERT_ETRLE_COMPRESS))
00151       {
00152             if( !ConvertToETRLE( &pOutputBuffer, &uiCompressedSize, (UINT8 **) &pSubImageBuffer, &usNumberOfSubImages, (UINT8 *)pData, sWidth, sHeight, fFlags ) )
00153             {
00154             }
00155             uiSubImageBufferSize = (UINT32) usNumberOfSubImages * STCI_SUBIMAGE_SIZE;
00156 
00157             Header.Indexed.usNumberOfSubImages = usNumberOfSubImages;
00158             Header.uiStoredSize = uiCompressedSize;
00159             Header.fFlags |= STCI_ETRLE_COMPRESSED;
00160       }
00161 
00162       //
00163       // save file
00164       //
00165 
00166       pOutput = fopen( cOutputName, "wb" );
00167       if (pOutput == NULL )
00168       {
00169             return;
00170       }
00171   // write header
00172       fwrite( &Header, STCI_HEADER_SIZE, 1, pOutput );
00173       // write palette and subimage structs, if any
00174       if (Header.fFlags & STCI_INDEXED)
00175       {
00176             if (pPalette != NULL)
00177             {
00178                   // have to convert palette to STCI format!
00179                   pSGPPaletteEntry = pPalette;
00180                   for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < 256; uiLoop++)
00181                   {
00182                         STCIPaletteEntry.ubRed = pSGPPaletteEntry[uiLoop].peRed;
00183                         STCIPaletteEntry.ubGreen = pSGPPaletteEntry[uiLoop].peGreen;
00184                         STCIPaletteEntry.ubBlue = pSGPPaletteEntry[uiLoop].peBlue;
00185                         fwrite( &STCIPaletteEntry, STCI_PALETTE_ELEMENT_SIZE, 1, pOutput );
00186                   }
00187             }
00188             if (Header.fFlags & STCI_ETRLE_COMPRESSED)
00189             {
00190                   fwrite( pSubImageBuffer, uiSubImageBufferSize, 1, pOutput );
00191             }
00192       }
00193 
00194       // write file data
00195       if (Header.fFlags & STCI_ZLIB_COMPRESSED || Header.fFlags & STCI_ETRLE_COMPRESSED)
00196       {
00197             fwrite( pOutputBuffer, Header.uiStoredSize, 1, pOutput );
00198       }
00199       else
00200       {
00201             fwrite( Image.pImageData, Header.uiStoredSize, 1, pOutput );
00202       }
00203 
00204       // write app-specific data (blanked to 0)
00205       if (Image.pAppData == NULL )
00206       {
00207             if (Header.uiAppDataSize > 0)
00208             {
00209                   for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < Header.uiAppDataSize; uiLoop++)
00210                   {
00211                         fputc( 0, pOutput );
00212                   }
00213             }
00214       }
00215       else
00216       {
00217             fwrite( Image.pAppData, Header.uiAppDataSize, 1, pOutput );
00218       }
00219 
00220       fclose( pOutput );
00221 
00222       if( pOutputBuffer != NULL )
00223       {
00224             MemFree( pOutputBuffer );
00225       }
00226 
00227 }

00231 #define COMPRESS_TRANSPARENT                    0x80
00232 #define COMPRESS_NON_TRANSPARENT          0x00
00233 #define COMPRESS_RUN_LIMIT                            0x7F
00234 
00235 #define TCI       0x00
00236 #define WI        0xFF

00238 UINT32 ETRLECompressSubImage( UINT8 * pDest, UINT32 uiDestLen, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage );
00239 UINT32 ETRLECompress( UINT8 * pDest, UINT32 uiDestLen, UINT8 * pSource, UINT32 uiSourceLen );
00240 BOOLEAN DetermineOffset( UINT32 * puiOffset, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, INT16 sX, INT16 sY );
00241 BOOLEAN GoPastWall( INT16 * psNewX, INT16 * psNewY, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, UINT8 * pCurrent, INT16 sCurrX, INT16 sCurrY );
00242 BOOLEAN GoToNextSubImage( INT16 * psNewX, INT16 * psNewY, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, INT16 sOrigX, INT16 sOrigY );
00243 BOOLEAN DetermineSubImageSize( UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage );
00244 BOOLEAN DetermineSubImageUsedSize( UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage );
00245 BOOLEAN CheckForDataInRows( INT16 * psXValue, INT16 sXIncrement, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage );
00246 BOOLEAN CheckForDataInCols( INT16 * psXValue, INT16 sXIncrement, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage );
00247 UINT8 * CheckForDataInRowOrColumn( UINT8 * pPixel, UINT16 usIncrement, UINT16 usNumberOfPixels );

00249 BOOLEAN ConvertToETRLE( UINT8 ** ppDest, UINT32 * puiDestLen, UINT8 ** ppSubImageBuffer, UINT16 * pusNumberOfSubImages, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, UINT32 fFlags )
00250 {
00251       INT16                               sCurrX;
00252       INT16                               sCurrY;
00253       INT16                               sNextX;
00254       INT16                               sNextY;
00255       UINT8 *                             pOutputNext;
00256       UINT8 *                             pTemp;
00257       BOOLEAN                             fContinue = TRUE;
00258       BOOLEAN                             fOk = TRUE;
00259       BOOLEAN                             fStore;
00260       BOOLEAN                             fNextExists;
00261       STCISubImage *    pCurrSubImage;
00262       STCISubImage            TempSubImage;
00263       UINT32                              uiCompressedSize = 0;
00264       UINT32                              uiSubImageCompressedSize;
00265       UINT32                              uiSpaceLeft;
00266 
00267       // worst-case situation estimate
00268       uiSpaceLeft = (UINT32) usWidth * (UINT32) usHeight * 3;
00269       *ppDest = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( uiSpaceLeft );
00270       CHECKF( *ppDest );
00271       *puiDestLen = uiSpaceLeft;
00272       
00273       pOutputNext = *ppDest;
00274 
00275       if (fFlags & CONVERT_ETRLE_COMPRESS_SINGLE)
00276       {
00277             // there are no walls in this image, but we treat it as a "subimage" for
00278             // the purposes of calling the compressor
00279 
00280             // we want a 1-element SubImage array for this...
00281             // allocate!
00282             *pusNumberOfSubImages = 1;
00283             *ppSubImageBuffer = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( STCI_SUBIMAGE_SIZE );
00284             if (!(*ppSubImageBuffer))
00285             {
00286                   MemFree( *ppDest );
00287                   return( FALSE );
00288             }
00289             pCurrSubImage = (STCISubImage *) *ppSubImageBuffer;
00290             pCurrSubImage->sOffsetX = 0;
00291             pCurrSubImage->sOffsetY = 0;
00292             pCurrSubImage->usWidth = usWidth;
00293             pCurrSubImage->usHeight = usHeight;
00294             if (!(fFlags & CONVERT_ETRLE_NO_SUBIMAGE_SHRINKING))
00295             {
00296                   if (!(DetermineSubImageUsedSize( p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, pCurrSubImage )))
00297                   {
00298                         MemFree( *ppDest );
00299                         return( FALSE );  
00300                   }
00301             }
00302             uiSubImageCompressedSize = ETRLECompressSubImage( pOutputNext, uiSpaceLeft, p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, pCurrSubImage );
00303             if (uiSubImageCompressedSize == 0)
00304             {
00305                   MemFree( *ppDest );
00306                   return( FALSE );
00307             }
00308             else
00309             {
00310                   pCurrSubImage->uiDataOffset = 0;
00311                   pCurrSubImage->uiDataLength = uiSubImageCompressedSize;
00312                   *puiDestLen = uiSubImageCompressedSize;
00313                   return( TRUE );
00314             }
00315       }
00316       else
00317       {
00318             // skip any initial wall bytes to find the first subimage
00319             if (!GoPastWall( &sCurrX, &sCurrY, usWidth, usHeight, p8BPPBuffer, 0, 0 ))
00320             { // no subimages!
00321                   MemFree( *ppDest );
00322                   return( FALSE );
00323             }
00324             *ppSubImageBuffer = NULL;
00325             *pusNumberOfSubImages = 0;
00326                         
00327             while (fContinue)
00328             {
00329                   // allocate more memory for SubImage structures, and set the current pointer to the last one
00330                   pTemp = (UINT8 *) MemRealloc( *ppSubImageBuffer, (*pusNumberOfSubImages + 1) * STCI_SUBIMAGE_SIZE );
00331                   if (pTemp == NULL)
00332                   {
00333                         fOk = FALSE;
00334                         break;
00335                   }
00336                   else
00337                   {
00338                         *ppSubImageBuffer = pTemp;
00339                   }
00340                   pCurrSubImage = (STCISubImage *) (*ppSubImageBuffer + (*pusNumberOfSubImages) * STCI_SUBIMAGE_SIZE);
00341                   
00342                   pCurrSubImage->sOffsetX = sCurrX;
00343                   pCurrSubImage->sOffsetY = sCurrY;         
00344                   // determine the subimage's full size
00345                   if (!DetermineSubImageSize( p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, pCurrSubImage ))
00346                   {
00347                         fOk = FALSE;
00348                         break;
00349                   }
00350                   if (*pusNumberOfSubImages == 0 && pCurrSubImage->usWidth == usWidth && pCurrSubImage->usHeight == usHeight)
00351                   {
00352                         printf( "\tWarning: no walls (subimage delimiters) found.\n" );
00353                   }
00354       
00355                   memcpy( &TempSubImage, pCurrSubImage, STCI_SUBIMAGE_SIZE );
00356                   if (DetermineSubImageUsedSize( p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, &TempSubImage))
00357                   {
00358                         // image has nontransparent data; we definitely want to store it
00359                         fStore = TRUE;
00360                         if (!(fFlags & CONVERT_ETRLE_NO_SUBIMAGE_SHRINKING))
00361                         {
00362                               memcpy( pCurrSubImage, &TempSubImage, STCI_SUBIMAGE_SIZE );
00363                         }
00364                   }
00365                   else if (fFlags & CONVERT_ETRLE_DONT_SKIP_BLANKS)
00366                   {
00367                         // image is transparent; we will store it if there is another subimage
00368                         // to the right of it on the same line
00369                         // find the next subimage
00370                         fNextExists = GoToNextSubImage( &sNextX, &sNextY, p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, sCurrX, sCurrY );   
00371                         if (fNextExists && sNextY == sCurrY )
00372                         {
00373                               fStore = TRUE;
00374                         }
00375                         else
00376                         {
00377                               // junk transparent section at the end of the line!
00378                               fStore = FALSE;
00379                         }
00380                   }
00381                   else
00382                   {
00383                         // transparent data; discarding
00384                         fStore = FALSE;
00385                   }
00386 
00387                   if (fStore)
00388                   {
00389                         // we want to store this subimage!
00390                         uiSubImageCompressedSize = ETRLECompressSubImage( pOutputNext, uiSpaceLeft, p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, pCurrSubImage );
00391                         if (uiSubImageCompressedSize == 0)
00392                         {
00393                               fOk = FALSE;
00394                               break;
00395                         }
00396                         pCurrSubImage->uiDataOffset = (*puiDestLen - uiSpaceLeft);
00397                         pCurrSubImage->uiDataLength = uiSubImageCompressedSize;
00398                         // this is a cheap hack; the sOffsetX and sOffsetY values have been used
00399                         // to store the location of the subimage within the whole image.  Now
00400                         // we want the offset within the subimage, so, we subtract the coordatines
00401                         // for the upper-left corner of the subimage.
00402                         pCurrSubImage->sOffsetX -= sCurrX;
00403                         pCurrSubImage->sOffsetY -= sCurrY;
00404                         (*pusNumberOfSubImages)++;
00405                         pOutputNext += uiSubImageCompressedSize;
00406                         uiSpaceLeft -= uiSubImageCompressedSize;
00407                   }
00408                   // find the next subimage
00409                   fContinue = GoToNextSubImage( &sCurrX, &sCurrY, p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, sCurrX, sCurrY );
00410             }
00411       }
00412       if (fOk)
00413       {
00414             *puiDestLen -= uiSpaceLeft;
00415             return( TRUE );
00416       }
00417       else
00418       {
00419             MemFree( *ppDest );
00420             if (*ppSubImageBuffer != NULL)
00421             {
00422                   MemFree( *ppSubImageBuffer );
00423             }
00424             return( FALSE );
00425       }
00426 }
00427 
00428 UINT32 ETRLECompressSubImage( UINT8 * pDest, UINT32 uiDestLen, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage )
00429 {
00430       UINT16            usLoop;
00431       UINT32            uiScanLineCompressedSize;
00432       UINT32            uiSpaceLeft = uiDestLen;
00433       UINT32            uiOffset;
00434       UINT8 *           pCurrent;
00435 
00436       CHECKF( DetermineOffset( &uiOffset, usWidth, usHeight, pSubImage->sOffsetX, pSubImage->sOffsetY ) )
00437       pCurrent = p8BPPBuffer + uiOffset;
00438 
00439       for (usLoop = 0; usLoop < pSubImage->usHeight; usLoop++)
00440       {
00441             uiScanLineCompressedSize = ETRLECompress( pDest, uiSpaceLeft, pCurrent, pSubImage->usWidth );
00442             if (uiScanLineCompressedSize == 0 )
00443             { // there wasn't enough room to complete the compression!
00444                   return( 0 );
00445             }
00446             // reduce the amount of available space
00447             uiSpaceLeft -= uiScanLineCompressedSize;
00448             pDest += uiScanLineCompressedSize;
00449             // go to the next scanline
00450             pCurrent += usWidth;
00451       }
00452       return( uiDestLen - uiSpaceLeft );
00453 }
00454 
00455 UINT32 ETRLECompress( UINT8 * pDest, UINT32 uiDestLen, UINT8 * pSource, UINT32 uiSourceLen )
00456 { // Compress a buffer (a scanline) into ETRLE format, which is a series of runs.
00457   // Each run starts with a byte whose high bit is 1 if the run is compressed, 0 otherwise.
00458       // The lower seven bits of that byte indicate the length of the run
00459       
00460       // ETRLECompress returns the number of bytes used by the compressed buffer, or 0 if an error
00461       // occurred
00462 
00463       // uiSourceLoc keeps track of our current position in the 
00464       // source
00465       UINT32      uiSourceLoc = 0;
00466       // uiCurrentSourceLoc is used to look ahead in the source to
00467       // determine the length of runs
00468       UINT32      uiCurrentSourceLoc = 0;
00469       UINT32      uiDestLoc = 0;
00470       UINT8       ubLength = 0;
00471       
00472 
00473       while (uiSourceLoc < uiSourceLen && uiDestLoc < uiDestLen)
00474       {
00475             if (pSource[uiSourceLoc] == TCI)
00476             { // transparent run - determine its length
00477                   do
00478                   {           
00479                         uiCurrentSourceLoc++;
00480                         ubLength++;
00481                   }
00482                   while ((uiCurrentSourceLoc < uiSourceLen) && pSource[uiCurrentSourceLoc] == TCI && (ubLength < COMPRESS_RUN_LIMIT));
00483                   // output run-byte
00484                   pDest[uiDestLoc] = ubLength | COMPRESS_TRANSPARENT;
00485                         
00486                   // update location
00487                   uiSourceLoc += ubLength;
00488                   uiDestLoc += 1;
00489             }
00490             else
00491             {     // non-transparent run - determine its length
00492                   do
00493                   {
00494                         uiCurrentSourceLoc++;
00495                         ubLength++;
00496                   }
00497                   while ((uiCurrentSourceLoc < uiSourceLen) && (pSource[uiCurrentSourceLoc] != TCI) && (ubLength < COMPRESS_RUN_LIMIT));
00498                   if (uiDestLoc + ubLength < uiDestLen)
00499                   {
00500                         // output run-byte
00501                         pDest[uiDestLoc++] = ubLength | COMPRESS_NON_TRANSPARENT;
00502                   
00503                         // output run (and update location)
00504                         memcpy( pDest + uiDestLoc, pSource + uiSourceLoc, ubLength );
00505                         uiSourceLoc += ubLength;
00506                         uiDestLoc += ubLength;
00507                   }
00508                   else
00509                   { // not enough room in dest buffer to copy the run!
00510                         return( 0 );
00511                   }                 
00512             }
00513             uiCurrentSourceLoc = uiSourceLoc;
00514             ubLength = 0;
00515       }
00516       if (uiDestLoc >= uiDestLen)
00517       {
00518             return( 0 );
00519       }
00520       else 
00521       {
00522             // end with a run of 0 length (which might as well be non-transparent,
00523             // giving a 0-byte
00524             pDest[uiDestLoc++] = 0;
00525             return( uiDestLoc );
00526       }
00527 }
00528 
00529 BOOLEAN DetermineOffset( UINT32 * puiOffset, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00530 {
00531       if (sX < 0 || sY < 0)
00532       {
00533             return( FALSE );
00534       }
00535       *puiOffset = (UINT32) sY * (UINT32) usWidth + (UINT32) sX;
00536       if (*puiOffset >= (UINT32) usWidth * (UINT32) usHeight)
00537       {
00538             return( FALSE );
00539       } 
00540       return( TRUE );
00541 }
00542 
00543 BOOLEAN GoPastWall( INT16 * psNewX, INT16 * psNewY, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, UINT8 * pCurrent, INT16 sCurrX, INT16 sCurrY )
00544 {
00545       // If the current pixel is a wall, we assume that it is on a horizontal wall and
00546       // search right, wrapping around the end of scanlines, until we find non-wall data.
00547       while (*pCurrent == WI)
00548       {
00549             sCurrX++;
00550             pCurrent++;
00551             if (sCurrX == usWidth)
00552             { // wrap our logical coordinates!
00553                   sCurrX = 0;
00554                   sCurrY++;
00555                   if( sCurrY == usHeight)
00556                   {
00557                         // no more images!
00558                         return( FALSE );
00559                   }
00560             }
00561       }     
00562 
00563       *psNewX = sCurrX;
00564       *psNewY = sCurrY;
00565       return( TRUE );
00566 }
00567 
00568 BOOLEAN GoToNextSubImage( INT16 * psNewX, INT16 * psNewY, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, INT16 sOrigX, INT16 sOrigY )
00569 {     // return the coordinates of the next subimage in the image
00570       // (either to the right, or the first of the next row down
00571       INT16                   sCurrX = sOrigX;
00572       INT16                   sCurrY = sOrigY;
00573       UINT32                  uiOffset;
00574       UINT8 *                 pCurrent;
00575       BOOLEAN                 fFound = TRUE;
00576       
00577       CHECKF( DetermineOffset( &uiOffset, usWidth, usHeight, sCurrX, sCurrY ) )
00578       pCurrent = p8BPPBuffer + uiOffset;
00579 
00580       if (*pCurrent == WI)
00581       {
00582             return( GoPastWall( psNewX, psNewY, usWidth, usHeight, pCurrent, sCurrX, sCurrY ) );
00583       }
00584       else 
00585       {
00586             // The current pixel is not a wall.  We scan right past all non-wall data to skip to
00587             // the right-hand end of the subimage, then right past all wall data to skip a vertical
00588             // wall, and should find ourselves at another subimage.
00589 
00590             // If we hit the right edge of the image, we back up to our start point, go DOWN to 
00591             // the bottom of the image to the horizontal wall, and then recurse to go along it
00592             // to the right place on the next scanline
00593 
00594             while (*pCurrent != WI)
00595             {
00596                   sCurrX++;
00597                   pCurrent++;
00598                   if (sCurrX == usWidth)
00599                   { // there are no more images to the right!
00600                         fFound = FALSE;
00601                         break;
00602                   }
00603             }     
00604             if (sCurrX < usWidth)
00605             {
00606                   // skip all wall data to the right, starting at the new current position
00607                   while (*pCurrent == WI)
00608                   {
00609                         sCurrX++;
00610                         pCurrent++;
00611                         if (sCurrX == usWidth)
00612                         { // there are no more images to the right!
00613                               fFound = FALSE;
00614                               break;
00615                         }
00616                   }
00617             }
00618             if (fFound)
00619             {                             
00620                   *psNewX = sCurrX;
00621                   *psNewY = sCurrY; 
00622                   return( TRUE );
00623             }
00624             else
00625             {
00626                   // go back to the beginning of the subimage and scan down
00627                   sCurrX = sOrigX;
00628                   pCurrent = p8BPPBuffer + uiOffset;
00629                   
00630                   // skip all non-wall data below, starting at the current position
00631                   while (*pCurrent != WI)
00632                   {
00633                         sCurrY++;
00634                         pCurrent += usWidth;
00635                         if (sCurrY == usHeight)
00636                         { // there are no more images!
00637                               return( FALSE );
00638                         }
00639                   }
00640                   // We are now at the horizontal wall at the bottom of the current image
00641                   return( GoPastWall( psNewX, psNewY, usWidth, usHeight, pCurrent, sCurrX, sCurrY ) );
00642             }
00643       }
00644 }
00645 
00646 BOOLEAN DetermineSubImageSize( UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage )
00647 {
00648       UINT32            uiOffset;
00649       UINT8 *           pCurrent;
00650       INT16             sCurrX = pSubImage->sOffsetX;
00651       INT16             sCurrY = pSubImage->sOffsetY;
00652 
00653       if (!DetermineOffset( &uiOffset, usWidth, usHeight, sCurrX, sCurrY ))
00654       {
00655                   return( FALSE );
00656       }
00657       
00658       // determine width
00659       pCurrent = p8BPPBuffer + uiOffset;
00660       do
00661       {
00662             sCurrX++;
00663             pCurrent++;
00664       } while( *pCurrent != WI && sCurrX < usWidth );
00665       pSubImage->usWidth = sCurrX - pSubImage->sOffsetX;
00666 
00667       // determine height
00668       pCurrent = p8BPPBuffer + uiOffset;
00669       do
00670       {
00671             sCurrY++;
00672             pCurrent += usWidth;
00673       } while( *pCurrent != WI && sCurrY < usHeight );
00674       pSubImage->usHeight = sCurrY - pSubImage->sOffsetY;
00675 
00676       return( TRUE );
00677 }
00678 
00679 BOOLEAN DetermineSubImageUsedSize( UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage )
00680 {
00681       INT16       sNewValue;
00682       // to do our search loops properly, we can't change the height and width of the
00683       // subimages until we're done all of our shrinks
00684       UINT16      usNewHeight;
00685       UINT16      usNewWidth;
00686       UINT16      usNewX;
00687       UINT16      usNewY;
00688 
00689       // shrink from the top
00690       if (CheckForDataInRows( &sNewValue, 1, p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, pSubImage ))
00691       {
00692             usNewY = sNewValue;
00693       }
00694       else
00695       {
00696             return( FALSE );
00697       }
00698       // shrink from the bottom
00699       if (CheckForDataInRows( &sNewValue, -1, p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, pSubImage ))
00700       {
00701             usNewHeight = (UINT16) sNewValue - usNewY + 1;
00702       }
00703       else
00704       {
00705             return( FALSE );
00706       }
00707       // shrink from the left
00708       if (CheckForDataInCols( &sNewValue, 1, p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, pSubImage ))
00709       {
00710             usNewX = sNewValue;
00711       }
00712       else
00713       {
00714             return( FALSE );
00715       }
00716       // shrink from the right
00717       if (CheckForDataInCols( &sNewValue, -1, p8BPPBuffer, usWidth, usHeight, pSubImage ))
00718       {
00719             usNewWidth = (UINT16) sNewValue - usNewX + 1;
00720       }
00721       else
00722       {
00723             return( FALSE );
00724       }
00725       pSubImage->sOffsetX = usNewX;
00726       pSubImage->sOffsetY = usNewY;
00727       pSubImage->usHeight = usNewHeight;
00728       pSubImage->usWidth = usNewWidth;    
00729       return( TRUE );
00730 }
00731 
00732 BOOLEAN CheckForDataInRows( INT16 * psYValue, INT16 sYIncrement, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage )
00733 {
00734       INT16       sCurrY;
00735       UINT32      uiOffset;
00736       UINT8 *     pCurrent;
00737       UINT16      usLoop;
00738 
00739       if (sYIncrement == 1)
00740       {
00741             sCurrY = pSubImage->sOffsetY;
00742       }
00743       else if (sYIncrement == -1)
00744       {
00745             sCurrY = pSubImage->sOffsetY + (INT16) pSubImage->usHeight - 1;
00746       }
00747       else
00748       {
00749             // invalid value!
00750             return( FALSE );
00751       }
00752       for (usLoop = 0; usLoop < pSubImage->usHeight; usLoop++)
00753       {
00754             if (!DetermineOffset( &uiOffset, usWidth, usHeight, pSubImage->sOffsetX, (INT16) sCurrY))
00755             {
00756                   return( FALSE );
00757             }
00758             pCurrent = p8BPPBuffer + uiOffset;
00759             pCurrent = CheckForDataInRowOrColumn( pCurrent, 1, pSubImage->usWidth );
00760             if (pCurrent)
00761             {
00762                   // non-null data found!
00763                   *psYValue = sCurrY;
00764                   return( TRUE );
00765             }
00766             sCurrY += sYIncrement;
00767       }
00768       return( FALSE );
00769 }
00770 
00771 BOOLEAN CheckForDataInCols( INT16 * psXValue, INT16 sXIncrement, UINT8 * p8BPPBuffer, UINT16 usWidth, UINT16 usHeight, STCISubImage * pSubImage )
00772 {
00773       INT16       sCurrX;
00774       UINT32      uiOffset;
00775       UINT8 *     pCurrent;
00776       UINT16      usLoop;
00777 
00778       if (sXIncrement == 1)
00779       {
00780             sCurrX = pSubImage->sOffsetX;
00781       }
00782       else if (sXIncrement == -1)
00783       {
00784             sCurrX = pSubImage->sOffsetX + (INT16) pSubImage->usWidth - 1;
00785       }
00786       else
00787       {
00788             // invalid value!
00789             return( FALSE );
00790       }
00791       for (usLoop = 0; usLoop < pSubImage->usWidth; usLoop++)
00792       {
00793             if (!DetermineOffset( &uiOffset, usWidth, usHeight, (UINT16) sCurrX, pSubImage->sOffsetY))
00794             {
00795                   return( FALSE );
00796             }
00797             pCurrent = p8BPPBuffer + uiOffset;
00798             pCurrent = CheckForDataInRowOrColumn( pCurrent, usWidth, pSubImage->usHeight );
00799             if (pCurrent)
00800             {
00801                   // non-null data found!
00802                   *psXValue = sCurrX;
00803                   return( TRUE );
00804             }
00805             sCurrX += sXIncrement;
00806       }
00807       return( FALSE );
00808 }
00809 
00810 UINT8 * CheckForDataInRowOrColumn( UINT8 * pPixel, UINT16 usIncrement, UINT16 usNumberOfPixels )
00811 {
00812       // This function, passed the right increment value, can scan either across or
00813       // down an image to find a non-transparent pixel
00814 
00815       UINT16      usLoop;
00816 
00817       for (usLoop = 0; usLoop < usNumberOfPixels; usLoop++)
00818       {
00819             if (*pPixel != TCI)
00820             {
00821                   return( pPixel );
00822             }
00823             else
00824             {
00825                   pPixel += usIncrement;
00826             }
00827       }
00828       return( NULL );
00829 }
